MAEBL also became evenly distributed around the merozoite plasma membrane as schizonts matured (Fig. 4(F)) colocalizing with MSP-1 (Fig. 4(H)). MAEBL was also seen in the rhoptries of these parasites as a double dot of fluorescence at the apical end of formed merozoites.
